column4: i'm looking to switch my ipod mini for an mp3 player that shows up on the desktop and i can just copy mp3's onto.
anyone got suggestions? I'm looking at the zen micro and some of the iriver flash players
...and it should work with ubuntu (of course)
any generic mp3 player will do that, ipod is the exception.  there are apps that will work with the ipod mini.  iriver devices support ogg which is a nice touch
